resources.string: Please choose whether this device is being used as a security device or a personal device. Security devices will be used to monitor your home, while personal devices are devices you use on a regular basis
Setting up your device as a security camera is done in 2 easy steps
To begin setting your device up as a security camera please select the security button shown above circled in red

Next, we have to supply the name of the room this security camera is going to monitor. The above example shows a security camera being set up for a kitchen. To proceed with the name you\'ve chosen select the save button
That\'s it, your device is now registered as a security device. You will now have a view of your camera so you can place it in an ideal spot.
A personal device is the device you will use to control your security cameras. Enabling your device as a personal device is very simple as you will see below.
To allow your device control your security cameras simply select the Personal button circled in red above
Once you\'ve chosen the personal option your device will begin looking for security cameras you have set up. The below image shows what you can expect once you\'ve chosen the personal option.
If any security devices are found then they will be presented to you in a list. If none are found then you will be given the option to search again
Are you sure you want to sign out
Are you sure you want to exit personal device mode
Are you sure you want to exit security device mode
Unable to access camera at this time
This device has been added to your group of devices
Unable to add this device to your group of devices. Log out and try again
To verify your account please check your inbox or junk folder for an email from HomeSecurity. Sign out and sign back in once you have verified your account
Failed to find any security devices
The camera is needed in order for this device to detect motion. Would you like to give permission to HomeSecurity to use this devices camera?
